FuncDef: The reset loop-detect trigger trigger-down command blocks the Down state of all interfaces or a specified interface.
CLIs: reset loop-detect trigger trigger-down { { interface { <interface-type> <interface-num> | <interfacename> } } | all }

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type of an interface.
-

Specifies the number of an interface.
-

Specifies the name of an interface.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After you have corrected the configurations that may cause loops, run the reset loop-detect trigger trigger-down command to cancel the Down state of all interfaces or the specified interfaces.
